value.title: Visually impaired persons try their hand at offering massage therapy
value.excerpt: Massage therapy business is among the most affected businesses as it was restricted severally yet the business has been increasingly viable for visually impaired people. value.title: Data hunters will be Big Pharma’s next prey
value.excerpt: Big Pharma will need to tool up in the data arms race. Drug giants like AstraZeneca are pouring $160 billion a year into unearthing new treatments. Artificial intelligence could provide a shortcut, by helping discover new treatments and getting them to market sooner.
